thread.title: Cheick Tiote: Newcastle midfielder joins Chinese second division side - BBC Sport
thread.title_full: Cheick Tiote: Newcastle midfielder joins Chinese second division side - BBC Sport

title: Cheick Tiote: Newcastle midfielder joins Chinese second division side - BBC Sport
text:
Read more about sharing. Ivory Coast international Cheick Tiote made 156 appearances for Newcastle in all competitions Newcastle United midfielder Cheick Tiote has joined Chinese second-tier side Beijing Enterprises Group FC for an undisclosed fee. 
The Ivorian made 139 league appearances for Newcastle after joining them in August 2010 from Dutch side FC Twente. 
The 30-year-old featured just three times for the Magpies this season. 
Tiote was also part of the Ivory Coast squad that won the 2015 Africa Cup of Nations.
